changelog: Image placeholder functionality for items in the Market page, Sell page and Prices window /prices command
Loading indicator improvements in the Market page
Error handling for image loading failures
Modified the Market component to handle loading states more effectively
Improved the server-side market prices handling to send all items at once
Fixed the market prices data handling to ensure all items are properly displayed
Fixed the issue where only one item would appear after loading multiple items in the Market page
Fixed an issue where adding a large number of products caused prices to not display on the market page
